input.sentences: [male] had no idea what was in store .
his mother made him a special monkey cake for his birthday .
he showed his mom the best present he received .
he even pretended to read the book !
output.sentences: The baby was forced to celebrate his birthday.
He had a monkey shaped cake.
He also had some big gifts from his family.
His mom enjoyed watching him open them.
He immediately began to try reading a book he got.
